title: “Taking part in the project has really changed our experience as a family” investigating parents’ experience of participation in a study to screen for fetal alcohol spectrum disorder
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Robyn McCarthy, Carolyn Blackburn, Raja AS. Mukherjee, Clare S. Allely, Penny A. Cook
